name: Milkshake Pancake
description:
Remember that scene in Ralph Break internet? 

The one with the bunny and lot of pancakes?

Here the same game where you need to feed the cat or a little bunny with they preferred food. So Pancake for the bunny, Milkshake for the cat.

Don't  make too much mistakes or you'll not finish the game. The less time it take the more points you'll get. Fight for the high score!

Here the site where you'll find this and many more games for Pokitto:

https://talk.pokitto.com/t/game-milkshake/2807
